text: A concert by saxophone maestro Kadri Gopalnath enthralled connoisseurs of Carnatic music in Puducherry on Monday night. The performance was among the series of concerts by leading artists hosted as part of celebrations at the Varadharaja Perumal temple, which is among the shrines where consecration ceremonies will be held on Wednesday.— Photo: T. Singaravelou
title: Soothing saxophone recital
